channel.title: Hey check out what I'm planning to do, and give me feedback!
channel.description:
Hey, I've been thinking a lot about pking, and I'm sure someone has done this before but I havent seen this on any server... So I was thinking about how a lot of people use banks while private server pking (maybe thats you, maybe thats not you) either way, people do it, and I'm really tired of people doing this because it takes away the whole point of pking... sorta So I was conspiring an idea to rid banking in the wilderness... I know it sounds like a shitty idea, but I then thought of making an item that would allow you to use the bank instead, so that way it would slow things down, and make pking more stratigic
So heres what I would do for this (I want you to choose one of these options) I've put pro's (+) and con's (-) for each one ____________________________________________________
#1. Pro's
+I would get rid of banking in the wilderness +I would replace this with an object that lets you access a bank +This object would cost a lot of money +This object can be obtained through clue scrolls or mini-quests (my server only) +It would add more strategy to pking
Con's
-People could keep multiple banking items in their bank so therefore they could store more banks and access them later -It would give an unfair advantage to rich players ____________________________________________________
#2 Pro's
+(Everything in option 1)
Con's
-(Everything in option 1) -I would try to add a timer for the bank --I would make the banking item untradeable and unsellable __________________________________________________
#3
I keep wilderness banking _________________________________________________
Okay so yeah choose one of these options and then tell me why you chose this or what I could add to it (and why I should add this) Thanks, Mimz (00ryn00)
**Please don't spam, flame, be a complete dick**

item.title: Hey check out what I'm planning to do, and give me feedback!
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

I don’t have any idea’s for you at the moment, but i do back your idea of how having a friggin bank booth in the middle of the wildy is retarded. 70% pk sources have that. Anyways, ima CBA with some thought’s for you, tell me if you like

Read full topic
item.source: Hey check out what I'm planning to do, and give me feedback!

item.title: Hey check out what I'm planning to do, and give me feedback!
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

[quote=“Hidendra, post:3, topic:230577”]#4 - Remove all banking from the wilderness.

It’s the wilderness, hence, wild and not very well populated. So why would a bank be traveling around there, even as an object? Even so, if you’re going there to pk, people will just bank get food go back, they might as well teleport somewhere to a bank (home area for example), bank there, and go back.

referring to xstrxpurez’s post: Please don’t make even a bank command from anyone, that means unfair advantage, and for admins and crap who pk they’ll just cheat. If you’re going to die, die with honor and gain respect.[/quote]

Totally awesome, but still, I was focusing around the imp box in real runescape, only instead of one item, it would be one click and you could do your banking then

Read full topic

item.title: Hey check out what I'm planning to do, and give me feedback!
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

no clue what u said… lol but about the banking while in pking… its possible to remove it… and if they type ::Bank make that command mod+ only… or admin+ only… and for ppl running to bank by the wild… remove the global object or make it so ppl can freeze them lol… its really not to hard… or make it say for the banking… inSafeZone = true;…
} else {
sendMessage(“you must be out of the wild to bank”);
something like that…

Read full topic

item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

Hey, I’ve been thinking a lot about pking, and I’m sure someone has done this before but I havent seen this on any server…
So I was thinking about how a lot of people use banks while private server pking (maybe thats you, maybe thats not you) either way, people do it, and I’m really tired of people doing this because it takes away the whole point of pking… sorta
So I was conspiring an idea to rid banking in the wilderness… I know it sounds like a shitty idea, but I then thought of making an item that would allow you to use the bank instead, so that way it would slow things down, and make pking more stratigic

+I would replace this with an object that lets you access a bank
+This object would cost a lot of money
+This object can be obtained through clue scrolls or mini-quests (my server only)
+It would add more strategy to pking

-It would give an unfair advantage to rich players

Okay so yeah choose one of these options and then tell me why you chose this or what I could add to it (and why I should add this)
